page.title: 03Lands End Radio
page.content: {Lands End Radio}is the most southern of the Post Office's coast radio stations network which extends as far north as the{Shetland Islands. Altogether there are eleven medium range coast stations and one long range.The medium range stations provide radiotelegraph services to vessels up to 300 miles away,and radiotelephone services to those up to 200 miles away.They also maintain surveillance on international distress frequencies ,broadcast weather forecasts ,gale and navigation warnings, participate in the{'Medico'} scheme -where they act as a link between ships at sea and doctors on land -and connect oil and gas exploration rigs and production platforms with the rest of the world.
